channel.title: banking industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in banking industry on FinanClub

item.title: BBD
item.description: score:-96 Chances: CEOs of major Brazil lenders see ‘unique opportunity’ for local economy. Amazon set to launch credit card in Brazil with Bradesco. Bankers expect lower delinquency rates with easing cycle in Brazil. BBD reports positive Q2 2023 earnings results. Risks: BBD’s profit plunges 76%, bad loan provisions near $3 billion.

item.title: KEY
item.description: score:5 Chances: KeyBank invests in community support and charitable donations. KeyCorp celebrates new branch openings and community partnerships. Positive dividend announcements and grants from KeyBank Foundation. KeyCorp’s growth potential and value as a value stock. KeyBank’s expansion of products and services for clients.
